WRITING.TEXT: do people actually enjoy playing like that?? haha

WRITING.TITLE: I've seen alot of camping in my time... but this has got to be the worst

WRITING.TEXT: totally agree but yeah I doubt this would ever get implemented
i've never seen it kill 1 burst in the foot before tbh...
M16 can be used close range better than a shotgun, mid range better than any AR and can even beat snipers long range... Starting to get really bored of dying to it every game...
